RequestType - Enum Class in climatemonitoring.core
This class contains enumeration constants that are used to send a request from the proxy (client) to the skeleton (server).

searchCentersByName(String) - Method in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database
Returns in alphabetical order an array of centers which have a name that contains the input string For example, if the given string is "var" then the output would be an array like this: { "Centro di Varese", "Centro di Novarese", "Centro di Isola Dovarese", ...
